box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Rate Limiter
- Identify repeat users by IP or API key
- Use key-value store in memory,
Â Â key: IP/API key
Â Â value: time of last request or
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â doubly linked list of request times
- Two options for time checking.Â Use 10 requests per hour
as example.
Â Â 1. limit time between requests to 60/10 = 6 minutes,
Â Â Â Â store last time as value in memory
Â Â 2. limit time between current request and 10th previous
Â Â Â Â request, store double linked list in memory.Â Check
Â Â Â Â timestamp of tail, if < 1 hour ago, reject; if > 1 hour ago
Â Â Â Â move tail up to 9th request, remove last node, addÂ
Â Â Â Â new node to head for current request and let requestÂ
Â Â Â Â through
- No need for persistence, if server restarts, reset limits

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 357px; margin-left: 197px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Load Balancer
- Partition by IP/API key, always
send user to same server
- Consistent hashing

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
